name: twisted memories
description: you play as jack, an abandoned building explorer. You have decided to explore an abandoned mental asylum. However you come across something strange. before you know it, you are escaping some strange world. will you escape or suffer forever? (don't judge the game it was made in like 3 days) note: for some reason the game has a tendency to have you fall through the platforms. i have no clue why it does this.
